nodes.text: An unidentified DUM-series pit droid worked for the Toydarian junk dealer Watto at his shop in Mos Espa on Tatooine around the year 22 BBY, when Anakin Skywalker came with Padmé Amidala, questioning the whereabouts of his mother. The pit droid has white plating, unlike most of his counterparts who had a tan-orange hue.
